Package roborally.game.structure

Class Phase

  • java.lang.Object
    • roborally.game.structure.Phase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPhase
    public class Phase
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPhase
    This class handles all the details of the game. Each phase consists of a number of events handled in run(roborally.gameview.layout.ILayers), and robots play their card through the method playNextRegisterCard(), which is iterated through an actual timed event handled in Events.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Phase​(java.util.ArrayList<Robot> robots, IGameBoard gameBoard, Events events, UIElements uiElements)

      boolean checkForWinner()
      Checks if a robot has collected all the flags

      void moveAllConveyorBelts​(ILayers layers)
      Moves the conveyor belts
      void moveCogs​(ILayers layers)
      Moves the cogs
      void playNextRegisterCard()
      Plays the next registered card
      void registerFlagPositionsAndUpdateArchiveMarker()
      Checks if a robot has arrived at the correct flag, if so then it updates its checkpoint/archive marker and registers the flag
      void registerRepairSitePositionsAndUpdateArchiveMarker()
      Checks if a robot has arrived at the repair site, if so then it updates its checkpoint/archive marker and gives the back one health/removes one damage token
      void run​(ILayers layers)
      Goes through a phase and does the appropriate actions
